data.eml:eml: Two new species of the genus Panorpa (Mecoptera: Panorpidae) from Shaanxi, China with notes on their biology

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Xue, Hua, Baozhen, Cai, Lijun, Huang, Pengying (2007): Two new species of the genus Panorpa (Mecoptera: Panorpidae) from Shaanxi, China with notes on their biology. Zootaxa 1542: 59-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177900
